feed.title: Yamtrack Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.16.1
entry.content:
Features

  • Now the episodes of an item will be added immediately to the calendar when it starts to be tracked (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/a19852c246fb98d0cae14af4bcf220f96f41868a)
  • Added automatic retrieval of metadata if title or image is missing in Yamtrack csv import (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/1693cad9f499c937b816ce1a58a206d545ee46b9)

Fixes

  • Fixed generation of media id for manually created items (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/c359493fdc706759a418de7c8d2c412531958a0f)
  • Fixed special seasons were displaying their title incorrectly (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/697cde9f059ba12f83bc4890a6f8ecd0ec32d0a0)
  • Fixed incorrectly formatted image for the cover of a list when its first item has no image (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/1693cad9f499c937b816ce1a58a206d545ee46b9)

Maintenance

  • Bump aiohttp from 3.11.8 to 3.11.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/285
  • Bump ruff from 0.8.0 to 0.8.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/284
  • Bump django from 5.1.3 to 5.1.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/283
  • Bump djlint from 1.36.1 to 1.36.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/282

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.16.0...v0.16.1

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.17.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Added book tracking with openlibrary (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/58006475bc84d8eaa8c787843701e1bb1b91a12c)
  • Allow disable types of media tracking though profile page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/245e5137baa537be60e39f74afd7098b4e5175ec)

Other

  • Redesign media details page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/8bda72c24a3699996a66a3c768608b259de0869a)

Maintenance

  • Bump ruff from 0.8.2 to 0.8.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/289
  • Bump django-select2 from 8.2.1 to 8.2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/288
  • Bump coverage from 7.6.8 to 7.6.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/287
  • Bump redis[hiredis] from 5.2.0 to 5.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/286

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.16.1...v0.17.0

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.17.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed error when loading some media from MangaUpdates (#290)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.17.0...v0.17.1

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.17.2
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed calendar page not accesible when there are book events #292 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/d9acd555457329519ff66b482f9408aa42437158)
  • Fixed that some detail pages of seasons were not loading. #293 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/635255eb1695efd5eefc9f6eb0883236d1e24562)
  • Fixed some spacing problems on the media details page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/46f904e441f768c09e6697da6e503e3c77fe6bf5)

Maintenance

  • Bump fakeredis from 2.26.1 to 2.26.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/291

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.17.1...v0.17.2

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.17.3
entry.content:
Features

  • Added a toggle to hide disabled media types from the search bar #296 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/e08f31887c39ac9296699f56057ff1f0ec60f1f7)

Fixes

  • Fixed error when adding item manually #298 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/d53bb06bef4511dd657b394d486b1224a991b003)

Other

  • Added an empty message to the media details column when no data is available. (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/975b4e91bc2500b8e9a3101df30e5ef490ef7cd4)

Maintenance

  • Bump ruff from 0.8.3 to 0.8.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/295
  • Bump aiohttp from 3.11.10 to 3.11.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/294

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.17.2...v0.17.3
